author: Ted Byrne
content:
I'm on the road tonight in a grim motel room that was abruptly brightened by this image. One of your very best. It is such a fantasy. Yes, Bill is right. Those are gummy chairs. Wonderful idea. Thanks a lot for brightening my night.

Ted
